descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72002-0-1450341093.jpg[/img]
 
This mod adds a female follower.
This is standalone. So you can use this with no problem whatever body types you're using.
 
 
[b][Follower detail][/b]
 
Name: Elysia the Swirl
Level: 10 - No limit
Voice: Young Eager (Vanilla)
Body: CBBE or UNP
Location: Frostfruit Inn, Rorikstead
Combat Style: One-handed
Spells: Unrelenting Force, Conjure Familiar
Perks: Light Foot, Agile Defender, Armsman, Savage Strike, Novice Conjuration
ETC: Essential and marriable
 
 
[b][Recommended Mods][/b]
 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light by tktk1[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation by nao4288[/url] (I recommend an optional file too)
 
 
[b][Credit][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834]Demoniac- High Quality Female Body Texture by Regenbot03[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70603]New Mikan Eyes by nerune[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr. Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54172]Katana-YotoHatamonba by YYK Moral cat[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71843]The Lily - Armour Mashup by pottoply[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13929]Sabers Swords -Changes- by Kadaj7412[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL[/url]
 
Thank you for the mods.
 
 
[b][Video][/b]


[youtube]0WtYVBpaRjc[/youtube]
by pixelgamerch
 
Thank you for the video.
 
 
[b][Change Log][/b]
  
v1.1 You can fortify Elysia's katana. And I modify a texture path of katana effect.
